roleset.name: go up
roleset.note: RISE-V NOTES: Let's use EXT for numericals only, otherwise Arg2-MNR: (from rise.01-v)
RISE-N NOTES: Roleset based on rise.01. Verbnet clas spatial_configuration-46.6. Framed by Katie. (from rise.01-n)

role.descr: causer of inception/rising of arg1, likely to occur with light verb

example.name: rise-v: all args
example.text: Sales rose 4% to $3.28 billion from $3.16 billion.

example.name: rise-v: arg2 as manner
example.text: The index rose modestly as well.

example.name: rise-v: with locative
example.text: Stock prices rose fractionally in moderate trading.

example.name: rise-v: with temporal
example.text: Georgia Gulf stock rose $1.75 a share yesterday

example.name: rise-v: non-financial usage
example.text: Mr. Hahn rose swiftly through the ranks

example.name: rise-v: and again
example.text: The sun rises in the west.

example.name: rise-n: Example with args 2, 3, and 4
example.text: a monthly rise of 0.2 % in September from August

example.name: rise-n: Example with most args
example.text: a 6 % rise in revenue to $ 323.2 million from $ 305.7 million

roleset.name: (cause to) come into existence
roleset.note: ARISE-V NOTES: Member of Vncls appear-48.1.1. Comparison to 'come about'. (from arise.01-v)
RISE-N NOTES: Added by Julia to better account for light verb 'give rise', which was not taggable in the rise.01 roleset.

example.name: arise-v: unaccusative
example.text: Mr. Guber and Mr. Peters claim they have an oral agreement with Warner executives that allows them to terminate their contract should the opportunity to run a major studio arise.
example.arg: the opportunity to run a major studio

example.name: arise-v: with CAU
example.text: The current opportunities arise because the process for executing a buy or sell order in the actual stocks that make up the S& P 500 is more cumbersome than transacting in the futures market.
example.arg: because the process for executing a buy or sell order in the actual stocks that make up the S& P 500 is more cumbersome than transacting in the futures market

example.name: arise-v: split construction
example.text: Speculation has also arisen that the UAL executive most closely identified with the failure to gain bank financing, chief financial officer John Pope, may come under pressure to resign.
example.arg: [Speculation][that the UAL executive most closely identified with the failure to gain bank financing, chief financial officer John Pope, may come under pressure to resign]

example.name: arise-v: with source arg0
example.text: John's loneliness arises from his poor personal hygiene.

example.name: rise-n: Give rise
example.text: It gave rise to the rituals of rural existence
example.arg: to the rituals of rural existance

roleset.name: revolt
roleset.note: RISE_UP-, UPRISING-N NOTES: Added by Julia for AMR.

example.name: rise_up-v
example.text: The American colonies rose up against British rule

example.name: uprising-n
example.text: While the USC military was fighting in the central regions, there was a popular uprising against Siyaad Barre in Mogadishu.

example.name: LOC
example.text: The Middle East uprisings have all been and are internal affairs .

example.name: arg 1
example.text: An uprising against the Taliban has evicted the gunmen from 50 villages in eastern Afghanistan

example.name: both args
example.text: The Uprising of Ivaylo (Bulgarian: ?????????? ?? ??????) was an uprising of the Bulgarian peasantry against the Emperor Constantine Tikh and the Bulgarian nobility.
example.arg: against the Emperor Constantine Tikh and the Bulgarian nobility
